thread.title: Another library vacation
thread.title_full: Another library vacation - Review of Library Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: L941
title: Another library vacation
text:
Our 12th visit to a library hotel. Lovely visit, helpful staff, clean, comfortable room, breakfast excellent, cheese and wine great but only criticism was on Saturday night at 7.00 pm no wine and cheese was available for 20 mins -30 due to cleaning of serving area surfaces, never experienced this before. Will visit again as appreciate what this hotel collection provides.
Room Tip: From past experience their cosy room has a tiny wardrobe/cupboard really not enough room and no spa... See more room tips
